attributes.action: Put street lighting back on in Lincolnshire
attributes.background:
Street lighting is turned off from around 11:30pm - 7am making our homes and cars a target for criminals! 
This makes us all  vulnerable 
Please sign & share ❤️

rejection.details:
We are only able to accept petitions that are addressed to central government or Parliament.

This petition concerns a matter which is the responsibility of local authorities in Lincolnshire:
https://www.lincolnshire.gov.uk/transport-and-roads/road-management-and-maintenance/management-services/street-lighting/128982.article
